snippet: A mostly self-guided tour is now available at two vast Warner Bros. sound studios on the Leavesden Studios lot, about 20 miles northwest of London, where the Harry Potter movies were filmed.
abstract: Mostly self-guided Harry Potter tour is now available at two vast Warner Brothers sound studios on the Leavesden Studios lot, near London, where the Harry Potter movies were filmed.
lead_paragraph: A mostly self-guided tour is now available at two vast Warner Bros. sound studios on the Leavesden Studios lot, about 20 miles northwest of London, where the Harry Potter movies were filmed.

headline.seo: Studio Tour Casts Spells Like Harry Potter
headline.main: Studio Tour Casts Spells Just Like Harry
headline.print_headline: Studio Tour Casts Spells Just Like Harry
